summary:
Adds 3 new craftable & upgradeable Zatoichi Swords to Skyrim. The choices available are:

Iron
Steel
Ebony

Each is placed in their section of the crafting menu.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/7079/zatoichititle.png[/img][/center]

[center][b]Featured:[/b][/center]
[center][youtube]8a9sTb8UuFY[/youtube][/center]

=================
Requirements:
=================

Skyrim 1.8 +

=================
Description:
=================

This adds a new set of craftable Zatoichi katanas to Skyrim, each one is available in the following types:

Iron
Steel
Dwarven
Elven
Orchish
Ebony

Each are also available as Short Zatoichi as well.

The Meshes and Textures are all new and the textures are 2048x2048 resolution. An option lower resolution pack is available too.

=================
Installation
=================

1. Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
2. Make sure the Insanity\'s Zatoichi.esp is checked in the Launcher

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod
2. Uncheck the Insanity\'s Zatoichi.esp is checked in the Launcher

=================
Contact:
=================

InsanitySorrow @ TES Alliance

=================

=================

=================
